_comment: This is a configuration file for user-specific settings. Each key represents a unique user ID with corresponding configurations. Note: JSON syntax requires double quotes for strings and does not support single quotes or comments (// or #) like other programming languages. Arrays are denoted with square brackets [], and objects (key-value pairs) with curly braces {}.
_comment2: The following key is an example configuration for the CCA project. Please replace the placeholder values with your actual paths and settings.
